data.title: Directions and Map of Drake University
data.meta_description: See where Drake University is located, directions on how to get there, and a map of the Drake University campus.
data.text:
Drake University Driving Directions

From the East and North

At the northeast edge of Des Moines, I-80 and I-35 join and go west around the city while I-235 goes through Des Moines. Take I-235 west for about seven miles and exit on Exit 6 for 31st Street toward Historic Site/Terrace Hill. Turn right (north) onto 31st Street. Follow the road for one-half mile, then turn right (east) onto University Avenue. Travel a couple blocks on University Avenue until you reach Drake’s campus.

From the West and South

At the southwest edge of Des Moines, I-80 and I-35 join and go east around the city while I-235 goes through Des Moines. Take I-235 west for about seven miles and exit on Exit 6 for 31st Street toward Historic Site/Terrace Hill. Turn left (north) onto 31st Street. Follow the road for one-half mile, then turn right (east) onto University Avenue. Travel a couple blocks on University Avenue until you reach Drake’s campus.

Parking Directions

Individual visit (Monday—Friday): Individual visit (Monday—Friday): Reserved parking is available in Parking Lot 16—Olmsted Center (located immediately east of Aliber Hall). Cole Hall, Office of Admission, is located 0.02 miles east of the parking lot.

For complete parking regulations and vehicle registration information please visit Public Safety's Parking Information page. For more information, call Drake toll-free, 1-800-44-DRAKE.
